column2:
Double-click to pick a recipe for Spearmarshal Pants. Can be learned by armorsmiths, leatherworkers, and tailors.

Purchase these recipes from renown merchants in Elona after learning the base recipes from the story.
Double-click to learn a Sunspear matchlock recipe.
A recipe to make a Spearmarshal's Mask.
Lead your guild into battle with this banner!
You must have Ley Line Gliding to unlock this skill.

May cure sickness, ailments, flesh wounds, or other general maladies.
Claims not evaluated or guaranteed by the Captain's Council.
Return to your starting point and leave behind a clone at your previous location.
A simple commemoration of a momentous event.
Anniversary Backpack and Mail Carrier Pack
Token of friendship given by Varonos Porook in Bloodtide Coast after helping him activate anemones or defending against the Risen.
The medicine you were carrying has gone bad.
<c=@abilitytype>Survival.</c> Bleed foes with your next few attacks.
You do not possess the necessary permission to place or remove monuments.
Double-click to learn a Harrier's Mordant Slicer recipe.
Ability to place and remove monuments in the guild hall.
The player who controls the Orb of Impending Doom will deal more damage, but will also take damage over time and is doomed to die a tragic death.
Double-click to learn a Sunspear standard recipe.
Attained from the Fallen Masks adventure in the Forgotten City of Auric Basin by reaching a rank of bronze or better.

Can contain rawhide or thin leather squares.
Purchase from renown region karma merchants across the Crystal Desert with trade contracts.
Find trade contracts in chests and lost supplies.
Double-click to learn a Sunspear greatblade recipe.
A recipe to make Spearmarshal's Gloves.

Can contain venom sacs, fangs, or scales of any value.
Purchase from renown region karma merchants across the Crystal Desert with trade contracts.
Find trade contracts in chests and lost supplies.
This activates a hard wood logging node within your home instance for daily gathering.
Carrying a cooking pot has increased your movement speed by 33%%.
You can return to your previous location.
Guild Wars 2: Heart of Thorns required to purchase episode
Second Life: Once obtained, a minion of Dwayna revives you the next time you are downed and increases your team's health and toughness.
Use the special action skill when it's available to counter the jade construct's spectral agony!
A recipe to make a Spearmarshal's Cowl.
Double-click to open. Contains Badges of Honor, Tomes of Knowledge, Resonating Slivers, and Potions of WvW Rewards.
A recipe to make a Spearmarshal's Helm.

Can contain ancient or elder wood logs.
Purchase from renown region karma merchants across the Crystal Desert with trade contracts.
Find trade contracts in chests and lost supplies.
